message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000.  It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below your estimated value and above my minimum asking price.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of a price around $750,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $750,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I can't go below $850,000. This still offers you a significant profit margin, and it's closer to my own valuation of the product.  Let's meet in the middle.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $800,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
